description: John Gollop is cautioned after he was spotted looking at pictures of women on his iPad.
title: Guernsey Deputy viewed 'inappropriate' pictures at meeting
title_page: Guernsey Deputy viewed 'inappropriate' pictures at meeting - BBC News
maintext: "However, he acknowledged that his actions could be regarded as disrespectful to the person who was in the photograph and an intrusion into her life and, further, that he may not have shown her sufficient respect", the report read.
